name: Jumpinball
description:
Jumpinball

It's a pinball game but with a twist! After you gain enough points, new gamestyle will appear and you have to keep the ball in the air with your mouse! If you gather enough points with that style, you will be back on the normal pinball gamestyle but you will have to gather more points to get to the other gamestyle back!.

Controls

PC - Arrow Keys or Mouse for pins and Mouse for 2nd gamestyle

Mobile - Tapping for pins and Holding your finger on screen for 2nd gamestyle
